state: The dinner is almost ready! It's only missing a grilled milk. -= Bedroom =- You find yourself in a bedroom. The room is well lit. You can make out a chest drawer. You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal an antique trunk. You shudder, but continue examining the room. You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a king-size bed. But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage. Hm. Oh well There is a closed wooden door leading east. > -= Bedroom =-0/1
